scripts.build: npm run ngc && npm run rollup && npm run copy
scripts.build:watch: npm run build && onchange "src/**/*" -- npm run build
scripts.rollup: rollup build/eang.js -o dist/eang.js && rollup build/eang.js -o dist/eang.es5.js
scripts.copy: cpx "build/**/!(*.js)" dist && cpx src/package.json dist && cpx README.md dist
scripts.publish: npm run ngc && npm run rollup && npm run copy
